Title: Correction to: Apoptosis resistance in epithelial tumors is mediated by tumor-cell-derived interleukin-4 (Cell Death & Differentiation, (2008), 15, 4, (762-772), 10.1038/sj.cdd.4402305)
Abstract: © 2019, The Author(s), under exclusive licence to ADMC Associazione Differenziamento e Morte Cellulare.We have only now noticed that in Fig. 3a, the immunohistochemical analysis of IL-4Rα on paraffin-embedded sections from breast is incorrect: IL-4 from breast was duplicated and used for the IL-4Rα staining. The correct Fig. 3a is given below.
